item-handbooktext-static-saber:
A good choice for efficiently slicing up enemies. The blade can be heated until red-hot to set foes on fire.
When depleted, it will stop dealing damage. Don't forget to recharge!
item-handbooktext-static-spear:
A great choice for piercing enemies. It has two throwing modes: standard and ionizing spear. In the second mode, the spear causes strong air ionization upon hitting any living creature, triggering a lightning strike and igniting the target. This consumes 10% of the charge capacity.
Playing with lightning is dangerous—be careful.
When fully discharged, it stops dealing damage. Don’t forget to recharge!
item-handbooktext-static-shield:
Excellent protection with a built-in flashlight.
Stops absorbing damage when discharged. Remember to recharge!
item-handbooktext-static-helmet:
Superior defense and functionality.
Stops absorbing damage when discharged. Remember to recharge!
item-handbooktext-static-armor:
Superior defense and functionality. Allows flying by pressing the R key.
Stops absorbing damage and disables flight mode when discharged. Remember to recharge!
item-handbooktext-static-boots:
Superior defense and functionality.
Stops absorbing damage when discharged. Remember to recharge!
item-handbooktext-edrill:
Mining reaches a new level. Allows operation in multiple modes: 1x1, 1x3 (vertical), 3x1 (horizontal), 3x3. In 3x3 mode, power consumption is tripled.
When discharged, it will stop working. Don’t forget to recharge!
item-handbooktext-echisel:
Functions as a battery-powered chisel. No hammer needed in your off-hand. Not used in recipes.
When it runs out of charge, it stops working. Don’t forget to recharge!
item-handbooktext-edrilltip: Base component for the electric drill.
item-handbooktext-eaxe:
Great for chopping. Not used in recipes.
When it runs out of charge, it stops working. Don’t forget to recharge!
